monsterDetails.exploreAbilityDescription: - Creates a rock obstacle - Activates ground switches
monsterDetails.lightShiftAbilityDescription: Aura: Every Monster in the party gains 3 Charge stacks at the start of each turn.
monsterDetails.darkShiftAbilityDescription: Every action applies an additional damage hit (75% Attack or Magic), shield (75% Defense), heal (7.5% Max Health) or a random Buff, depending on action type.

skills.name: 1000 Leaves
skills.description: 2 x 140% (280%) physical damage (earth) Hits all enemies, cannot be dodged Shield all allies for 1 x (600 + 75% Defense)

skills.name: Aeons
skills.description: At the start of the turn, heal 3% of this Monster's Max HP for every Age stack. (Capped at 7 stacks)

skills.name: Aging
skills.description: At the end of its turn, this Monster gains an Age stack.

skills.name: Attack Plus
skills.description: Improve Attack rating by 1 (Increases Attack by 26)

skills.name: Buffing Heal
skills.description: When applying a Buff, also heal the target by 50% of this Monster's Magic.

skills.name: Channel
skills.description: Applies Channel (Buff) to whole party

skills.name: Cleanse
skills.description: Every hit has a 25% chance to remove a Buff from the target.

skills.name: Defense Focus
skills.description: Defense from equipment increased by 25%.

skills.name: Defense Healing
skills.description: Healing actions trigger an additional Heal on the Monster with the lowest Health equal to 50% of Defense value.

skills.name: Defense Overload
skills.description: Increase Attack and Magic by 15% of this Monster's Defense.

skills.name: Defense Plus
skills.description: Improve Defense rating by 1 (Increases Defense by 37)

skills.name: Defense Proc
skills.description: Every attack triggers an additional hit equal to 50% of Defense value.

skills.name: Disoriented
skills.description: Unique Aura: Weakness (Debuff) causes enemies affected by it to have a 7.5% chance to miss each hit.

skills.name: Earth Resistance
skills.description: Earth damage reduced by 50%

skills.name: Earthquake
skills.description: 1 x 165% physical damage (earth) Hits all enemies

skills.name: Earthquake Lvl 2
skills.description: 2 x 100% (200%) physical damage (earth) Hits all enemies

skills.name: Earthquake Lvl 3
skills.description: 3 x 85% (255%) physical damage (earth) Hits all enemies

skills.name: Fire Weakness
skills.description: Fire damage increased by 50%

skills.name: Full Restore
skills.description: Heal target for 4 x (200 + 30% Magic) Shield target for 4 x (200 + 30% Defense) Removes 6 Debuffs

skills.name: Full Utility
skills.description: Applies Channel, Regeneration & Sidekick (Buffs)

skills.name: Full Utility Lvl 2
skills.description: Applies Channel, Regeneration, Sidekick & Glory (Buffs)

skills.name: Full Utility Lvl 3
skills.description: Applies Channel, Regeneration, Sidekick, Glory & Barrier (Buffs)

skills.name: Healing Shield
skills.description: Healing skills (active and passive) also apply a Shield equal to 20% of the amount healed.

skills.name: Health Plus
skills.description: Improve Health rating by 1 (Increases Health by 332)

skills.name: Hybrid Mastery
skills.description: Increases Attack by 10% of this Monster's Magic and increases Magic by 10% of this Monster's Attack.

skills.name: Improved Mana Regeneration
skills.description: +20% Mana Regeneration

skills.name: Leaf Slash
skills.description: 3 x 50% (150%) physical damage (earth) cannot be dodged

skills.name: Leaf Slash Lvl 2
skills.description: 4 x 50% (200%) physical damage (earth) cannot be dodged

skills.name: Leaf Slash Lvl 3
skills.description: 5 x 50% (250%) physical damage (earth) cannot be dodged

skills.name: Leaf Slash Lvl 4
skills.description: 5 x 65% (325%) physical damage (earth) cannot be dodged

skills.name: Leaf Slash Lvl 5
skills.description: 6 x 70% (420%) physical damage (earth) cannot be dodged

skills.name: Magic Plus
skills.description: Improve Magic rating by 1 (Increases Magic by 26)

skills.name: Mana Plus
skills.description: Improve Mana rating by 1 (Increases Mana by 20. Increases Mana Regeneration by 10)

skills.name: Mass Restore
skills.description: Heal all for (200 + 70% Magic) Removes 1 Debuff from all allies

skills.name: Mass Restore Lvl 2
skills.description: Heal all for 2 x (175 + 40% Magic) Removes 1 Debuff from all allies

skills.name: Mass Restore Lvl 3
skills.description: Heal all for 2 x (250 + 50% Magic) Removes 2 Debuffs from all allies

skills.name: Meditation
skills.description: Whenever this Monster spends a turn without attacking an enemy, it gains 6 Charge stacks.

skills.name: Multi Weakness
skills.description: Aura: Weakness (Debuff) can be stacked two additional times on enemies. Additional stacks are only half as strong.

skills.name: Power Healing
skills.description: Healing actions trigger an additional Heal on the Monster with the lowest Health equal to 50% of Attack value.

skills.name: Primal Rage
skills.description: Increases the damage dealt by 5% and additional 5% for every Age stack.

skills.name: Protector
skills.description: Aura: All Monsters in the party receive 7.5% less damage.

skills.name: Punch Combo
skills.description: 3 x 65% (195%) physical damage (neutral)

skills.name: Punch Combo Lvl 2
skills.description: 4 x 65% (260%) physical damage (neutral)

skills.name: Punch Combo Lvl 3
skills.description: 5 x 65% (325%) physical damage (neutral)

skills.name: Punch Combo Lvl 4
skills.description: 5 x 80% (400%) physical damage (neutral)

skills.name: Punch Combo Lvl 5
skills.description: 6 x 85% (510%) physical damage (neutral)

skills.name: Purify
skills.description: Healing actions also remove 4 harmful Stacks (Bleed, Wound, Blind, Tether). Multi-Target-Heals remove 2.

skills.name: Restore
skills.description: Heal target for 4 x (50 + 20% Magic) Removes 1 Debuff

skills.name: Restore Lvl 2
skills.description: Heal target for 5 x (60 + 25% Magic) Removes 2 Debuffs

skills.name: Restore Lvl 3
skills.description: Heal target for 5 x (70 + 25% Magic) Removes 3 Debuffs

skills.name: Restore Lvl 4
skills.description: Heal target for 6 x (100 + 25% Magic) Removes 3 Debuffs

skills.name: Restore Lvl 5
skills.description: Heal target for 7 x (120 + 25% Magic) Removes 4 Debuffs

skills.name: Shadow Proc
skills.description: Every action applies an additional damage hit (75% Attack or Magic), shield (75% Defense), heal (7.5% Max Health) or a random Buff, depending on action type.

skills.name: Shield Aura
skills.description: Aura: All Shield effects of Monsters in the party are increased by 10%.

skills.name: Shieldcast
skills.description: Applies Channel (Buff) to whole party Applies Spellshield (Buff) to a random Monster.

skills.name: Shieldcast Lvl 2
skills.description: Applies Channel (Buff) to whole party Applies Spellshield (Buff) to two random Monsters.

skills.name: Shieldcast Lvl 3
skills.description: Applies Channel & Spellshield (Buffs) to whole party

skills.name: Shielding Leaves
skills.description: 3 x 95% (285%) physical damage (earth) Shield self for 1 x (200 + 100% Defense)

skills.name: Shielding Leaves Lvl 2
skills.description: 4 x 90% (360%) physical damage (earth) Shield self for 1 x (350 + 110% Defense)

skills.name: Shielding Leaves Lvl 3
skills.description: 5 x 90% (450%) physical damage (earth) Shield self for 1 x (600 + 125% Defense)

skills.name: Spore
skills.description: 3 x 55% (165%) magical damage (earth) Applies Weakness (Debuff)

skills.name: Spore Lvl 2
skills.description: 4 x 50% (200%) magical damage (earth) Applies Weakness (Debuff)

skills.name: Spore Lvl 3
skills.description: 5 x 50% (250%) magical damage (earth) Applies Weakness (Debuff)

skills.name: Spore Lvl 4
skills.description: 5 x 65% (325%) magical damage (earth) Applies Weakness (Debuff)

skills.name: Spore Lvl 5
skills.description: 6 x 70% (420%) magical damage (earth) Applies Weakness (Debuff)

skills.name: Spore Nebula
skills.description: 3 x 95% (285%) magical damage (earth) Hits all enemies, every hit has a 20% chance to apply Weakness (Debuff).

skills.name: Static
skills.description: Non-critical hits deal 20% more damage.

skills.name: Tranquility
skills.description: Aura: Each Nature and Spirit monster in your party applies Weakness on a random enemy after each action.

skills.name: Utopia
skills.description: Aura: Every Monster in the party gains 3 Charge stacks at the start of each turn.

skills.name: Weaken
skills.description: Every hit has a 10% chance to apply Weakness.
